dialogue.start: You say I stole a necklace, but then again I forget a lot of things. Well maybe if I got a boysenberry pie from Kassidy I can maybe remember. I'm sure if you bring her five boysenberries she can bake up a pie for me.
dialogue.active: I'm only getting hungrier by the minute, you're lucky that my stomach isn't big enough for two pies!
dialogue.completed: Mhmm, this sure is delicious. You didn't bring me any milk? Oh well, I can do without. Just let me finish this first.
dialogue.r_completed: That kid sure does love boysenberry pie, anything for that sweetheart. Here you go, give it to him while it's still fresh will ya.
